Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I only go to my teacher with a final draft of something, AI I use to make sure my sentences flow, almost like reading it out loud. I dont always do what it says.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: teacher makes you feel more sure, im insecure about my grammar and writing so Ai at least is something that wont make me too self-concious
